tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had an amazing experience at Dental Earth. Dr. Chetna  was very friendly and professional in her behavior towards me as a patient. Clinic had all the state of the art facilities which made me a lot more confident to go ahead with them. I would gladly recommend Dr. Chetna and give a big thumbs up. Thank you doctor!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Thanks a lot Dr. Chetna for handling my case effectively. It was a complex situation for my wife with RCT and simultaneously surgical Wisdom Tooth extraction. She and her team is highly professional and efficient. The best part which I liked is scheduling both process in such a way that it minimised pain and medicines. 
Thanks a lot Ma'am.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I took my grandmother to Dr. Chetna Bharti based on my friend's recommendation. We had a pleasant experience over here. We went for second opinion too but came back because of her practical advise on treatment plan. Clinic is equipped with latest state of art technologies & equipment. I would like to thank you for being patient with us and our queries. All the very best and keep up the good practice.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Chetna puts one at ease as treatment of dental problems could be daunting. She explained the whole problem and solution painstakingly. In addition her post procedure care is commendable.

Highly recommend.

review: I went to correct my teeth position with the help of clips and all. She treated me very well and called the MDS doctor for my treatment. I am very happy with the progress i am seeing in myself. I am liking my face now a days more.  Thank you

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: We had great experience to visit chetna bharti clinic the way the problem was illustrated  was awesome most important thing is behaviours total friendly nature .The clinic set up was excellent and very hygenic so I m happy to visit here I hadnt done any surgery but I suggest any dental problem plz visit there. Thanks Chetna and your supporting staff Regards Sashi Prasad
reply_text: Thank you so much sir....your kind words means a lot sir and it really boost us. Thank you so much sir  for writing on our page...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Although I was made to wait a little, if I do not fear dentists any more, it's because of Dr. Bharti. She treated the cavity in my molar and I could convince my father for a flap treatment. I recommend her for all the healthy tooth habits my family practises now and the overall dental health of my Family. She's professional and trustworthy.
